name: Saikyou Ginsei Shougi 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Saikyou Ginsei Shougi 2" is equipped with a database of 1.2 million standard moves. Putting computer thinking ability and standard moves set out by human wisdom together, you can play the strongest shougi ever. Four levels of computer strength are available, making it a game enjoyable for all.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
??

One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
